name: Hl7VSLivingWill
title: hl7VS-livingWill
description: Value Set of codes that specify whether or not the patient has a living will and, if so, whether a copy fo the living will is on file at the healthcare facility.  If the patient does not have a living will, the value of this field indicates whether the
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

contains.display: Yes, patient has a living will
Yes, patient has a living will but it is not on file
No, patient does not have a living will and no information was provided
No, patient does not have a living will but information was provided
